channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road markings faint, 5th July
item.description:
Both roundabouts and give way line is quite hard to see, in wet weather
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Traffic cones taking 6 parking spaces, 5th July
item.description:
End of Millbrook Street, GL50 3RP

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, Millbrook Street, Alstone, Cheltenham

item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Hedge row/ trees, opposite the parking spaces are damaging school coaches, 5th July
item.description:
The tree line opposite the row of houses and parking spaces means that branches encroach on to the road, making it near impossible for the contracted school coach to pass between that the and parked cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 5th July
item.description:
Grass verge Causing obstruction to pavement/road Traffic island very untidy with bits of dry long grass in kerbside and broken bits of grass blowing around both roads.after previous complaint workmen cut back overgrown vegetation but did not clean up island as requested.island needs filling in with tarmac as its abandoned by highways or council
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 5th July
item.description:
F way pothole 1200 600 80 give and take (FW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 5th July
item.description:
Email received 04/07/2024 - copy attached. Customer reports potholes at the location which have not been marked in white, whilst others have been; these are the ones related to a claim they have raised. They have asked that these are added to the others in the location, as it appears they have been overlooked. They also ask when the work will be carried out.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 5th July
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 5th July
